attributes.name: Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true (Automated)
attributes.rationale: Connections from apiserver to kubelets could potentially carry sensitive data such as secrets and keys. It is thus important to use in-transit encryption for any communication between the apiserver and kubelets.
attributes.audit:
Run the following command on the control plane node:
```
ps -ef | grep kube-apiserver
```
Verify that the `--kubelet-https` argument either does not exist or is set to `true`.
attributes.remediation:
Edit the API server pod specification file
`/etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml` 
on the control plane node and remove the `--kubelet-https` parameter.
attributes.impact: You require TLS to be configured on apiserver as well as kubelets.
attributes.default_value: By default, kubelet connections are over https.
